==Abilities and Attacks==
''Most attack names are unofficial.''
===Normal===
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = State Shift
|desc_1      = When hit by {{Electro}} or {{Pyro}} attacks, the Floating Dendro Fungus will enter an Activated or Scorched state respectively, gaining enhanced attacks. A Floating Dendro Fungus can only undergo state shift once.
* If the Floating Dendro Fungus is defeated while Activated or Scorched, it may drop {{Item|Inactivated Fungal Nucleus}}, {{Item|Dormant Fungal Nucleus}}, and {{Item|Robust Fungal Nucleus}}, while the drop rates for {{Item|Fungal Spores}}, {{Item|Luminescent Pollen}}, and {{Item|Crystalline Cyst Dust}} will greatly reduce.

|name_2      = Orb Throw
|desc_2      = Throws an orb of Dendro energy at the player, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Dendro DMG}}.
* '''Activated:''' Throws 3 orbs in a row.
* '''Scorched:''' DMG increased to '''100% ATK'''.
|file_2      = Floating Dendro Fungus Orb Throw
|caption_2   = Normal
|file_2_2    = Floating Dendro Fungus Orb Throw 2
|caption_2_2 = Activated
|file_2_3    = Floating Dendro Fungus Orb Throw 3
|caption_2_3 = Scorched

|name_3      = Bump
|desc_3      = Bumps into the player, dealing '''30% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
* '''Scorched:''' DMG increased to '''60% ATK''', knockback increased.
}}

===Fabulous Fungus Frenzy===
<section begin="fff skills"/>
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy       = Floating Dendro Fungus

|name_1      = Skill: Flowery Flechettes
|desc_1      = Goes all out and fires 6 consecutive Wildgrass Bullets, each dealing '''192% ATK''' as {{Color|Dendro DMG}}.<br />''Paimon sometimes considers questions like this: "Does the grass grow thicker where a Dendro Fungus's Bullets land?"''
|file_1      = Floating Dendro Fungus Flowery Flechettes

|name_2      = Overgrowth
|desc_2      = Heals the Fungus with the lowest [[HP]] in the party by '''36%''' of their Max HP.

|name_3      = Spore Cannon
|desc_3      = Fires a Wildgrass Bullet, dealing '''110% ATK''' as {{Color|Dendro DMG}} to opponents.
}}<!--
--><section end="fff skills"/>

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A spore organism of some intelligence. It possesses extreme adaptability.<br />A researcher once said that these are some species of [[Dendro Specter]]. After this view was criticized, he changed his tack, claiming that this was just a literary turn of phrase.|[[Archive]]}}
